column5: Whether you are in Plano/Addison/North Dallas area for business or pleasure you will enjoy this spacious 3 bedroom/3 full bathroom condominium with all you need to feel like you are at home. Great location near Dallas/Plano borderline, near major highways, George Bush/Dallas North Tollway. Within minutes of willow bend mall, shops of legacy, Dallas Galleria. Grocery store(Kroger), Chase, Bank of America just across the street. Plenty of fine dining within minutes.
